movies.title: Lettera aperta a un giornale della sera
movies.plot: A rash letter of protest sparks a crisis for a group of affluent, Communist intellectuals in Italy who find themselves suddenly challenged to back up their incendiary rhetoric with action.
movies.simplePlot: A rash letter of protest sparks a crisis for a group of affluent, Communist intellectuals in Italy who find themselves suddenly challenged to back up their incendiary rhetoric with action.

biography.bio: Daniele Costantini is a writer and director, known for La cerise sur le gâteau (2012), Assolo (2016) and Fatti della banda della Magliana (2005).
biography.name: Daniele Costantini

biography.bio: Nino Dal Fabbro was born on July 1, 1923 in Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy. He is known for his work on Lettera aperta a un giornale della sera (1970), In the Name of the Pope King (1977) and Crime Boss (1972). He was married to Vanna Polverosi. He died on August 17, 1980 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Nino Dal Fabbro

biography.bio: Laura De Marchi was born on July 25, 1936 in Savona, Liguria, Italy. She is an actress, known for Youth (2015), Nostalgia (1983) and L'au-delà (1981).
biography.name: Laura De Marchi

biography.bio: Daniele Dublino was born on July 1, 1945 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Carlo Sempio. He is an actor, known for Saint-Michel avait un coq (1972), L'argent de la vieille (1972) and La petite soeur du diable (1979).
biography.name: Daniele Dublino

biography.bio: Fabienne Fabre is an actress, known for Les subversifs (1967), Barbarella (1968) and Lettera aperta a un giornale della sera (1970).
biography.name: Fabienne Fabre

biography.bio: Piero Faggioni was born on August 12, 1936 in Carrara, Italy. He is known for his work on Oedipus orca (1977), The Pacifist (1970) and Lettera aperta a un giornale della sera (1970).
biography.name: Piero Faggioni

biography.bio: Graziella Galvani was born on June 27, 1931 in Milan, Lombardy, Italy. She is an actress, known for Pierrot le Fou (1965), Kapò (1960) and Miracles Still Happen (1974).
biography.name: Graziella Galvani

biography.bio: Lorenza Guerrieri was born on April 18, 1944 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is an actress, known for The Laughing Woman (1969), La vieille fille (1972) and La vie en miettes (1989).
biography.name: Lorenza Guerrieri

biography.bio: Nicole Karen is an actress, known for Quoi de neuf, Pussycat? (1965), Contes immoraux (1973) and Les plus belles escroqueries du monde (1964).
biography.name: Nicole Karen

biography.bio: Tanya Lopert was born on June 19, 1942 in New York, USA. She is an actress, known for Carnage (2011), Conte de la folie ordinaire (1981) and Fellini's Satyricon (1969).
biography.name: Tanya Lopert

biography.bio: Titina Maselli was born on April 11, 1924 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She was an actress, known for Disons un soir à dîner (1969) and Lettera aperta a un giornale della sera (1970). She was married to Toti Scialoja. She died on February 22, 2005 in Rome.
biography.name: Titina Maselli

biography.bio: Monica Strebel is an actress, known for Amore o qualcosa del genere (1968), Les sept de Marsa Matruh (1970) and Istantanea per un delitto (1975).
biography.name: Monica Strebel

biography.bio: Daniela Surina was born on September 20, 1942 in Trieste, Italy. She is an actress, known for China Is Near (1967), Divorce His - Divorce Hers (1973) and My Uncle Benjamin (1969).
biography.name: Daniela Surina

biography.bio: Nicole Tessier is an actress, known for Demons (1985), Les géants de Rome (1964) and Fuoricampo (1969).
biography.name: Nicole Tessier

biography.bio: Nanni Loy was born on October 23, 1925 in Cagliari, Sardinia, Italy. He was a director and writer, known for The Four Days of Naples (1962), Where's Picone? (1984) and Café Express (1980). He died on August 21, 1995 in Fiumicino, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Nanni Loy
